response.original_title: The Tragic Life of a Secret Gamer
response.overview: To his mother, David Hance was a shy, nerdy Puerto Rican kid from the Bronx who had an unhealthy obsession with video games. To everyone else, he was Alliedâ€”a world-class esports champion, whose boisterous live-streams garnered thousands of views. For years, Hance navigated these disparate identities with ease. But then, at age 24, he was diagnosed with Stage 4 cancer.
response.title: The Tragic Life of a Secret Gamer
